casebody.data:
NC DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY
v.
LEDFORD 223PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 13, 2016 Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, for North Carolina Department of Public Safety. Larry Leake, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Ledford, Chauncey John.

Jamie A. Stokes, Attorney at Law.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 12th of September 2016 by Petitioner:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of September 2016."

Petitioner shall have up to and including the 19th day of October 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
